mapper.select: select a.*, b.dept_name as deptName from anbiao_vehicle a inner join blade_dept b on a.dept_id = b.id where a.id=#{id}

select id, cheliangpaizhao, chepaiyanse, shiyongxingzhi, case when ifnull(jiashiyuanxingming,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(jiashiyuanxingming,'') end as jiashiyuanxingming, case when ifnull(jiashiyuandianhua,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(jiashiyuandianhua,'') end as jiashiyuandianhua, case when ifnull(yayunyuanxingming,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(yayunyuanxingming,'') end as yayunyuanxingming, case when ifnull(yayunyuandianhua,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(yayunyuandianhua,'') end as yayunyuandianhua, case when ifnull(chezhu,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(chezhu,'') end as chezhu, case when ifnull(chezhudianhua,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(chezhudianhua,'') end as chezhudianhua, case when ifnull(zongduanxinghao,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(zongduanxinghao,'') end as zongduanxinghao, case when ifnull(chejiahao,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(chejiahao,'') end as chejiahao, case when ifnull(changpai,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(changpai,'') end as changpai, case when ifnull(yunyingshang,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(yunyingshang,'') end as yunyingshang, case when ifnull(cheliangzhaopian,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(cheliangzhaopian,'') end as cheliangzhaopian, case when ifnull(zongduanid,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(zongduanid,'') end as zongduanid, case when ifnull(xinghao,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(xinghao,'') end as xinghao, case when ifnull(hedingzaike,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(hedingzaike,'') end as hedingzaike, case when ifnull(yunyingshangmingcheng,'') = 'null' then '' else ifnull(yunyingshangmingcheng,'') end as yunyingshangmingcheng, CASE WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=0 and ifnull(is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '在用' WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=1 and ifnull(is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '停用' WHEN ifnull(is_deleted,1) = 1 THEN '删除' END cheliangzhuangtai from anbiao_vehicle where 1=1 and cheliangpaizhao=#{cheliangpaizhao} and chepaiyanse=#{chepaiyanse} and ifnull(is_deleted,0) = 0 and ifnull(cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: update anbiao_vehicle set is_deleted = 1 , caozuoshijian = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
update anbiao_vehicle set cheliangzhuangtai = 1 , caozuoshijian = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
update anbiao_vehicle set cheliangzhuangtai = 0 , caozuoshijian = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
update anbiao_vehicle set cheliangzhuangtai = 2 , caozuoshijian = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
update anbiao_vehicle set dept_id = #{deptId} , caozuoshijian = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

if.test: orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM anbiao_vehicle WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND is_deleted = 0 and ifnull(cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 AND cheliangpaizhao NOT LIKE '%挂'
SELECT count(1) FROM anbiao_vehicle WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND is_deleted = 0 and ifnull(cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 AND cheliangpaizhao NOT LIKE '%挂' AND cheliangzhuangtai = 1

select
CASE WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=0 and ifnull(a.is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '在用' WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=1 and ifnull(a.is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '停用' WHEN ifnull(a.is_deleted,1) = 1 THEN '删除' END cheliangzhuangtai,
a.dept_id as deptId,b.dept_name as deptName,a.simnum,a.zongduanxinghao,a.caozuoshijian,a.createtime,a.id, a.cheliangpaizhao,a.chepaiyanse,a.shiyongxingzhi,a.zongduanid from anbiao_vehicle a inner join blade_dept b on a.dept_id = b.id where 1=1
and (a.createtime > #{caozuoshijian} or a.caozuoshijian > #{caozuoshijian}) and ifnull(cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 order by a.caozuoshijian asc
and ifnull(a.cheliangzhuangtai,0) = 0 and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 and ifnull(a.is_deleted,0) = 0
select DISTINCT id,yunyingshang from anbiao_vehicle where id = #{id}
select dict_key as chepaiyanse from blade_dict where code ='colour' and dict_key = #{color} and is_deleted = 0 and dict_key != -1

yayunyuandianhua,
chezhu,
chezhudianhua,
createtime,
caozuoren,
cheliangzhuangtai,
caozuorenid,
caozuoshijian,
is_deleted

mapper.update:
update anbiao_vehicle
shiyongxingzhi = #{shiyongxingzhi},
changpai = #{changpai},
chejiahao = #{chejiahao},
yunyingshang = #{yunyingshang},
yunyingshangmingcheng = #{yunyingshangmingcheng},
zongduanid = #{zongduanid},
xinghao = #{xinghao},
jiashiyuanid = #{jiashiyuanid},
jiashiyuanxingming = #{jiashiyuanxingming},
jiashiyuandianhua = #{jiashiyuandianhua},
yayunyuanxingming = #{yayunyuanxingming},
yayunyuandianhua = #{yayunyuandianhua},
yayunyuanid = #{yayunyuanid},
chezhu = #{chezhu},
chezhudianhua = #{chezhudianhua},
cheliangzhuangtai = #{cheliangzhuangtai},
caozuoren = #{caozuoren},
caozuoshijian = #{caozuoshijian},
caozuorenid = #{caozuorenid}
where dept_id = #{deptId} and cheliangpaizhao = #{cheliangpaizhao} and chepaiyanse = #{chepaiyanse} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: select zongduanid from anbiao_vehicle where is_deleted = 0 and ifnull(cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 and zongduanid = #{id} group by zongduanid LIMIT 1
mapper.sql:
select case when IFNULL(b.area,'') = '' then '河南' else b.area end as areaName, concat(#{begintime},'至',#{endtime}) as date, SUM(b.shu) as xzshu, SUM(zyshu) as zyshu, SUM(tyshu) as tyshu, SUM(scshu) as scshu, max(b.shiyongxingzhi) as shiyongxingzhi, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路货物运输' then SUM(b.shu) end as dlhwxzshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路危险品运输' then SUM(b.shu) end as dlwxpxzshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路旅客运输' then SUM(b.shu) end as dllkxzshu,
case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路货物运输' and ifnull(SUM(zyshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.zyshu) else 0 end as dlhwzyshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路危险品运输' and ifnull(SUM(zyshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.zyshu) else 0 end as dlwxpzyshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路旅客运输' and ifnull(SUM(zyshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.zyshu) else 0 end as dllkzyshu,
case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路货物运输' and ifnull(SUM(tyshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.tyshu) else 0 end as dlhwtyshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路危险品运输' and ifnull(SUM(tyshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.tyshu) else 0 end as dlwxptyshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路旅客运输' and ifnull(SUM(tyshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.tyshu) else 0 end as dllktyshu,
case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路货物运输' and ifnull(SUM(scshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.scshu) else 0 end as dlhwscshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路危险品运输' and ifnull(SUM(scshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.scshu) else 0 end as dlwxpscshu, case when IFNULL(max(b.shiyongxingzhi),'') = '道路旅客运输' and ifnull(SUM(scshu),0) > 0 then SUM(b.scshu) else 0 end as dllkscshu from(
)a inner JOIN( select a.dept_id, COUNT(1) as shu, max(shiyongxingzhi) as shiyongxingzhi, CASE WHEN max(cheliangzhuangtai)=0 and ifnull(max(a.is_deleted),0) = 0 THEN 1 end as zyshu, CASE WHEN max(cheliangzhuangtai)=1 and ifnull(max(a.is_deleted),0) = 0 THEN 1 end as tyshu, CASE WHEN max(cheliangzhuangtai)=2 and ifnull(max(a.is_deleted),0) = 0 THEN 1 end as bfshu, CASE WHEN ifnull(max(a.is_deleted),1) = 1 THEN 1 END scshu, b.area from anbiao_vehicle a inner join anbiao_organization b on a.dept_id = b.dept_id where 1=1 and b.isdelete = 0 and ifnull(a.cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 and a.createtime >= #{begintime} and a.createtime <= #{endtime} GROUP BY shiyongxingzhi, dept_id, b.area )b on a.id = b.dept_id where 1=1 GROUP BY b.area, b.shiyongxingzhi

if.test: orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0

mapper.sql:
select case when IFNULL(b.area,'') = '' then '河南' else b.area end as areaName, b.dept_id as deptId, a.dept_name as deptName, b.cheliangpaizhao, b.chepaiyanse, b.shiyongxingzhi, b.cheliangzhuangtai, case when ifnull(b.caozuoshijian,'') = '' then b.createtime else b.caozuoshijian end as caozuoshijian, a.is_deleted, b.caozuoren from(
)a inner JOIN( select a.dept_id, cheliangpaizhao, chepaiyanse, shiyongxingzhi, CASE WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=0 and ifnull(a.is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '在用' WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=1 and ifnull(a.is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '停用' WHEN ifnull(a.is_deleted,1) = 1 THEN '删除' END cheliangzhuangtai, a.caozuoshijian, a.createtime, a.caozuoren, a.is_deleted, b.area from anbiao_vehicle a inner join anbiao_organization b on a.dept_id = b.dept_id where 1=1 and b.isdelete = 0 and ifnull(a.cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 and a.caozuoshijian >= #{begintime} and a.caozuoshijian <= #{endtime} )b on a.id = b.dept_id ORDER BY b.dept_id

if.test: cheliangzhuangtai !=null and cheliangzhuangtai != '' and cheliangzhuangtai == '新增'.toString()
cheliangzhuangtai !=null and cheliangzhuangtai != '' and cheliangzhuangtai == '在用'.toString()
cheliangzhuangtai !=null and cheliangzhuangtai != '' and cheliangzhuangtai == '停用'.toString()
cheliangzhuangtai !=null and cheliangzhuangtai != '' and cheliangzhuangtai == '删除'.toString()
orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0

mapper.select: SELECT cheliangpaizhao, chepaiyanse, shiyongxingzhi, id, CASE WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=0 and ifnull(is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '在用' WHEN cheliangzhuangtai=1 and ifnull(is_deleted,0) = 0 THEN '停用' WHEN ifnull(is_deleted,1) = 1 THEN '删除' END cheliangzhuangtai FROM anbiao_vehicle WHERE 1=1 AND is_deleted=0 AND ifnull(cheliangzhuangtai,0) != 2 AND dept_id= #{deptId}
mapper.update: update anbiao_vehicle set zongduanid = #{zongduanid}, caozuoshijian = NOW(),caozuoren=#{caozuoren},caozuorenid=#{caozuorenid} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into anbiao_cheliang_jiashiyuan
vehid,
jiashiyuanid,
createtime,
type
#{vehid},
#{jiashiyuanid},
#{createtime},
#{type}
mapper.select: select dept_id,COUNT(1) as vehicleNum from anbiao_vehicle where dept_id = 5587 and is_deleted = 0
